```{julia}
import CairoMakie

fig_height = parse(Float64, ENV["QUARTO_FIG_HEIGHT"])
fig_width = parse(Float64, ENV["QUARTO_FIG_WIDTH"])

CairoMakie.activate!(type = fig_format)
CairoMakie.update_theme!(resolution=(fig_width * 100, fig_height * 100))
```
```{julia}
#| label: fig-covariance1111
#| fig-cap: "Covariance ellipses"

x = range(0, 10, length=100)
y = sin.(x)
CairoMakie.lines(x, y)
```


```{julia}
#| label: fig-covariance
#| fig-cap: "Covariance ellipses"

using Plots

fig_dpi = 300
fig_height = parse(Float64, ENV["QUARTO_FIG_HEIGHT"])
fig_width = parse(Float64, ENV["QUARTO_FIG_WIDTH"])

if fig_format == "pdf"
  gr(size=(fig_width, fig_height), fmt = :pdf, dpi = fig_dpi)
end

plot([0; 1.0], [ 0.12000000000; 0.12000000003])
```

### Chapter 2

```{julia}
#| label: fig-covariance1
#| fig-cap: "Covariance ellipses"

using StatsPlots

covellipse([0,2], [2 1; 1 4], n_std=2, 
           aspect_ratio=1, label="cov1")
covellipse!([1,0], [1 -0.5; -0.5 3], 
            showaxes=true, label="cov2")
```
